de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.managedbeans

Class CalendarBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.managedbeans.CalendarBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Named
 @SessionScoped
public class CalendarBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This bean provides data for the calendar and time based search entries.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getAllActiveYears

        public java.util.List<CalendarItemYear> getAllActiveYears()
                                                   throws PresentationException,
                                                          IndexUnreachableException
        This method returns a list of all active years.
        The method searches for the facet of the field 'YEAR'. If the count of a facet is greater than 0, the year is active.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IndexUnreachableException
        PresentationException

      • setSelectYear

        public void setSelectYear(java.lang.String selectYear)
                   throws PresentationException,
                          IndexUnreachableException
        Select a year. If the new value differs from the old one, the data for the new value gets generated.
        Parameters:
        selectYear - the selectYear to set
        Throws:

      • getSelectYear

      • populateMonthsWithDays

        public static java.util.List<CalendarItemMonth> populateMonthsWithDays(java.lang.String selectYear,
                                                                       java.lang.String collection,
                                                                       java.lang.String filterQuery)
                                                                throws PresentationException,
                                                                       IndexUnreachableException
        This method generates the data for each month of the selected year.
        It runs a facet search for YEARMONTH and YEARMONTHDAY for the current year. For each day of the year, the method checks if the count of the field YEARMONTHDAY is greater than 0. If this is the case, the day is an active element, otherwise it has no hits.
        Throws:
        IndexUnreachableException
        PresentationException
